name: Boat Parking Simulator ( 3D Driving Game )
description:
Ahoy! Team.Multi Billionaire is looking for someone to park all his boats to a Dock at his private Island You can work at his Harbor or Big private Island. Just steer each boat to the parking spot indicated by a rectangle. Make sure not to run into anything and remember an arrow will point you in the right direction. When you find the spot, try to park the boat straight and well within the rectangle. This way you can get the job done quickly,clear the levels without damaging the boats.
A huge selection and variety of missions to undertake, from avoiding mines, to mooring, parking, navigating, escaping and landing in some really tight spots!
Good Luck
